full_text: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said inflation had increased notably and would likely remain elevated in the coming months before moderating https://t.co/rM6WhbKxVd

localize.full_text: パウエル米連邦準備制度理事会（FRB）議長は、インフレ率が顕著に上昇しており、今後数ヶ月間は上昇を続けた後、緩やかになる可能性が高いと述べました。https://t.co/rM6WhbKxVd
